title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: On Bute, a fine and well-improved island, we open the Marquis of Bute's house of Mount Stewart,  neither apparently large nor elegant in architecture, but beautifully situated among well-grown trees, with an open and Itraight avenue to the sea-shore.

title: By Shamrock and Heather. [A tale.]
author: Downe, Walmer.
